Text: it is ok movie, not much difference from others as action film
Its good action..action scenes is amazing... they made their stunts themselves..no stuntmen what so ever...thumb up
Incredible Movie,Easily The Best Of The Year And Possibly Best In Quite A few Years.Can ome Please Get Some English Subs????How About An R5?????Thanx Great Quality For A VCD.

Incredible New Martial Arts Movie,Panna Rittikrai has outdone himself this time,this is everything that you could possibly ask for in a martial arts movie,incredible slection of different fighting styles moving at a lighting pace,wall to wall action thats relentless,NEEDS ENGLISH SUBS,otherwise absolutely Sensational!!!!Now only if we could get an R5.Great quality For A VCD.Thanx.
